sensors.name: Boiler Heating Temperature
sensors.description: Calibratable room temperature measuring transducer with Modbus connection, in an impact-resistant plastic housing for higher temperatures.

sensors.name: Drinking Water Temperature Boiler
sensors.description: Probe that measures water temperature from -40° to +70°C. Consists of a thermistor encased in a sheath made from grade 316L stainless steel.

sensors.name: Drinking Water Temperature House Supply
sensors.description: Probe that measures water temperature from -40° to +70°C. Consists of a thermistor encased in a sheath made from grade 316L stainless steel.

sensors.name: Flow Temperature
sensors.description: Inline Flow Temperature Sensor monitors the temperature of a fluid that passes through it.

sensors.name: Outdoor Temperature
sensors.description: Narrow-band, long range and low power consumption wireless sensor transmitting temperature from a NTC probe.

sensors.name: Pressure
sensors.description: Pressure Sensor for water pipe pressure measurement at water distribution utilities.

sensors.name: Return Flow Temperature
sensors.description: Inline Return Flow Temperature Sensor monitors the temperature of a fluid that passes through it. Output values are related to the Flow Temperature Sensor.

sensors.name: Room Temperature
sensors.description: Calibratable room temperature measuring transducer with Modbus connection, in an impact-resistant plastic housing for higher temperatures.
